roleset.name: bitchy, petty and mean
roleset.note: CATTY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Comparison to 'cruel.01' (from catty.01-j)

affected entity, target of catty behavior

example.name: arg0
example.text: i think that 's what happens when you do n't do anything but go to the same bar for ten years . That 's me being really catty though .
